title: Why Google Is Scrubbing Personal Info From Search Results (if You Ask Nicely)
description: As our lives become more digital, they’ve also become more searchable. Today, lots of people can find out personal information about you—phone number, physical address—with a simple Google search. This is not always ideal, or, frankly, comfortable.
